data.description:
EARLY ACCESS

Dive into the ultimate VR fun fair game, bringing the excitement and social buzz of the original Munich Oktoberfest right to your home. Be among the first to explore this virtual wonderland!

Key Features:
ğŸ¯ Fairground Games: Engage in gun shooting, ball throwing, and catapult games.
ğŸ¢ Virtual Motion Rides: Experience thrilling rides with realistic motion effects.
ğŸ‘• Avatar Customization: Personalize your look with traditional Bavarian outfits and accessories.
ğŸ› ï¸ Physics-Based Interactions: Enjoy realistic interactions with objects and games.
ğŸ¤ Social Game: Communicate with other players through integrated voice chat and enjoy new 2-player rhythm games.
ğŸº Trombone Simulator: Show off your musical skills and start own in-game band.
ğŸ¹ Bartending Game: Test your time management skills in an exciting bartending game.

Game Modes:
ğŸ•¹ï¸ Single-Player: Enjoy the festival at your own pace.
ğŸ® Multiplayer: Join others in real-time for shared fun and competition.
Progression and Rewards:
ğŸ… Leaderboards: Compete for the highest scores and see how you stack up against others.
ğŸ† Achievements: Unlock rewards for your accomplishments.
ğŸ Avatar Item Rewards: Earn unique items to further customize your avatar.

So, gear up, explore the bustling fairgrounds, and let the festivities begin! Join the closed beta today and be a part of the fun and socializing at Oktoberfest - The Official Game! 

Socials & webpage https://linktr.ee/oktoberfestgame
